data_table.description: Subject ID, sex, age, family history, and case or control of breast cancer of participants with or without breast cancer and involved in the "Shanghai Breast Cancer Genetics Study (SBCGS)" project.

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age of breast cancer diagnosis or recruitment for control

variable.name: family_history
variable.description: First-degree family history of breast cancer [1=Yes, 0=No, 99999=Missing]
